Question.QuestionName: What is the value of: int answer?
Which of the following variables is pass by value?
Which of these methods have correct syntax?
Question.optionC: public int add(int j, String h)
Question.answer: public int add(int j, String h)

Question.QuestionName: What is the correct function of the CPU?
Question.optionA: To allow the user to input information
Question.optionB: To process requests and be the "brains" of the computer
Question.optionC: To read DVD's and other media
Question.answer: To process requests and be the "brains" of the computer

Question.QuestionName: Which of the following operating systems in open source and/or free?
Which of the following is true about Math.random()?
Question.optionA: It generates a number between 0 and 1, including 1, but excluding 0
Question.optionB: It generates a number between 1 and 10
Question.optionC: It generates a number between 0 and 1, excluding both 0 and 1

Question.QuestionName: Which of the following can be found at the end of a do-while loop, after the closing curly brace?
What language is the following statement from? -(void) methodName:(NSString *)parameter;
What are the 10 most popular programming languages, from #10 to #1?
Question.optionA: Java, Java, Java, Java, Java, Java, Java, Java, Java, Java
Question.optionB: Ruby, Perl, Javascript, C#, Python, Visual Basic, PHP, C++, C, Java
Question.optionC: HTML, CSS, Java, Python, Ruby, Perl, Go, Objective-C, Swift, SQL, Javascript
Question.optionD: C#, Objective-C, Python, Go, Java, Javascript, Swift, SQL, HTML, CSS
Question.answer: Ruby, Perl, Javascript, C#, Python, Visual Basic, PHP, C++, C, Java

Question.QuestionName: When would the following return a runtime error: int answer = int a / int b;
Question.optionD: It would never return a runtime error because it is int division
